text: @Mike_Pence @WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump @FLOTUS Just repeating it over and over still doesn't make it true. You can't polish a turd Mike. The governments response to Covid19 was a joke and still is as the death toll is slowly beggining to rise again. Have the balls to treat ppl with some intelligence! We're not idiots.
